Kaleidoscope
by Instrument

Start
  • About,
  • Help,
  • Credits

Kaleidoscope is an interactive visual toy which uses the accelerometer of your handheld device to control the output on the screen.

Add shapes. Select a color scheme. Abstract it. Have fun!

Here's a cheat sheet for the top level of controls.

  • Toggle Kaleidoscope
  • Toggle Pixelate
  • Toggle Bleed Mode
  • Color Themes
  • Edit (Pause & Add Shapes)
  • Hide Menu
  • Back to About
  • Design: Dan Schechter
  • Development: Stefanie Hatcher
  • Producer: Amie Pascal
